about_the_game:
You, Yuuto Amamiya, are an average guy living alone for the first time. Though, honestly, you're not alone all that much, as the nice older women living in the building are always dropping by to check in on you, and you soon realize they're looking for something in return. Enjoy a sultry summer fulfilling the needs of three voluptuous, sex-starved MILFs!

Extra Content

After the main story, the four of you decide to go on an all-inclusive, fuck-filled onsen vacation. Three nymphomaniac ex-slut MILFs plus one lucky guy equals the steamiest hot springs trip of your life!

  • 15-20 hours of classic erotic visual novel experience.

  • St. Yariman’s sluts are back! These voluptuous, married, motherly alum live right next door and are supremely sex-deprived. Fulfill all your MILF fantasies with the reformed gyaru and secret masochist, Megumi; the serious(ly) debauched ‘educator’, Anna; and the ditzy, devoted goddess, Mako.

  • Over 30 fully uncensored sex scenes.

  • Fully voice acted in Japanese, with sensual performances from Himari, Momozono Kaoru, and Misonoh Mei.

  • A full graphical revamp of the original 2012 Japanese edition with brand new sultry scenes. Take a fuck-filled trip to the hot springs with your favorite ex-sluts!

Back in the day, she was a pale gyaru with stunning long blonde hair. These days, she wears glasses and a more sophisticated look.

As befits her serious look, she’s obsessed with her kid’s education and dresses the part, looking like a sexy librarian. Her husband runs an indie porn company, and she often helps him out. When you ask what sort of work she does though, she’ll just give you a sly smile. You wouldn’t know it from her serious, studious demeanor, but before she got married she worked as a top escort and performed in “educational” videos for young men. She wasn’t hurting for money, she just liked that kind of work, and it’s how she met her current husband. With the birth of her daughter Sachiho, she decided to prioritize being a mother. At the same time, she’s keenly aware that the debauched passions of her youth still simmer beneath the surface of her sensual body.

Her husband is rather reserved in his private sex life, which has left Anna feeling unfulfilled. Knowing this, he’s told Anna that she can seek satisfaction with other men; he’s also thinking that maybe he can secretly film her liaisons.

A full-time mother to twin girls, Kaori and Saori, she used to be a ditzy blonde gyaru, but these days she's a ditzy housewife.

Never without a gentle smile on her face, she’s a beautiful, refined, and angelic woman. As a stay-at-home mom, she diligently takes care of the house while also amusing herself with baking for her and her friends’ kids, sewing clothes, and other feminine hobbies. As a student at St. Marian’s with Anna and Megumi, she was well-known as a goddess who bestowed blessings upon the needy, and going out of her way to offer comfort. She ended up getting married to an easy-going guy she met during a rough time in her life when she was the one that needed a helping hand. He was the first guy who turned down Mako’s sexual advances, and Mako fell for his sincerity in helping her without asking anything in return.

She’s still devoted to her husband, but as she watches you embark on your new life alone, Mako feels the urge to reward you for your determination. Perhaps because of her husband’s indifference to sex, or her loneliness now that he’s been transferred away for work, whenever she looks at you she feels an irrepressible tingle.

As a teen, she was a delinquent gyaru. These days, she still has tanned skin, but she wears her hair in a demure ponytail.

Though she can be a little foul-mouthed, she’s a kind woman who looks out for others. In her years at St. Marian's Academy, she often ended up hooking up with shitty guys who just used her for sex. During this time she became close with her professor, confiding in him and gradually falling for him. When she graduated, she left her delinquent life behind to marry him, so she claims she’s reformed. He unfortunately died in a traffic accident when their son Kouta was only three years old. At the time, Megumi became super depressed, but with Anna and Mako’s support, and her drive to keep going for Kouta’s sake, she slowly recovered.

Though her late-husband left behind enough money them to live on, Megumi feels like it’d be a waste not to work, and she is diligent about both her job as a hairdresser and taking care of the house. With her determination, pleasant personality, and voluptuous chest, plenty of the local guys have the hots for her, but she knocks them all down like bowling pins, crushing their feelings to smithereens. She’s strong-willed, but if you aggressively put the moves on her, Megumi's masochistic tendencies will show themselves, and she’ll be putty in your hands.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains explicit sexual content intended for adults only. This includes scenes of oral sex, vaginal and anal penetration, exhibitionism, roleplay, shaving, sex toy use, and group sex.
